messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

on the the picture and the description have disappeared all together please help to recover them sent wednesday re updates hi present employee hub you can find entry form here by clicking plus sign you need define how should be used within you can create promoted link by following guideline id can take visitors some folder within resources section going have sub folders we have classic pages you can use announcements create separate items then have one going interconnect them but guess too complicated most colleagues did with promoted link folders if we talking about benefits content should be placed within site if about employees you should upload employee hub we also have but more for your purposes can you please open case for third issue picture description have disappeared together please help recover them thank you best marketing manager date wednesday updates hi got two questions related adding specific info one how where we add info there recommendation template for considering info being uploaded monthly basis we would like add promoted link our for benefits also be redirected benefits would have multiple links different benefits for each benefit we would like create specific exactly same was old one your advise what directory should we create these benefits pages logically them practice but apparently have editing rights for one please advise picture description have disappeared together please help recover them looking forward your thank you very much communication specialist registered under number whose registered old broad street kingdom does provide any clients each subsidiaries separate entity liability for
